title: Wind in the Willows (1995) Vanessa Redgrave animated
description:
"This version of "The Wind in the Willows" is without doubt the most faithful adaptation of a book into film of all time." - laterosenoonvale @ imdb

Very beautiful animated version of the classic tale; Vanessa Redgrave does a live opening and closing narration. Alan Bennett and Michael Palin voice Mole and Rat.

THIS VERSION IS NOT at TPB yet, the others are different versions. Chack and compare!

In segmented mpg format, plays on VLC (but you might have difficulty burning it).
